topicTitle: Double request on Cooper and Chaos_4_lunch

posts.postText:
Cooper and Chaos_4_lunch
# 16 "Cooper" STEAM_0:1:13447259 06:17 90 0 active
# 10 "[MOGZ] Chaos_4_lunch" STEAM_0:1:16582208 15:43 118 0 active
TTT
Both random accused then RDM'd me on my traitor round.
Screen shot in:
http://steamcommunity.com/id/hidden_assassin/screenshot/577797618542674892

I killed a Epic Turtle cause he was shooting out a opened door towards people, the detective even verified this. After wards they BOTH called me out and started shooting me for no reason. Detective confirmed that the guy i killed shot first and i had reasons to kill him.

Come on crisis I was there. This was not a malicious rdm. At most these guys both deserve a day ban (at most). shots started flying as soon as you killed epic turtle because he did not actually shoot at anyone and you killed him for it and it was easy for the other innocents to just see it as you killing an innocent. I recall you rdming me a few rounds later because of some burning body I had no idea about. So it's obvious that people can make mistakes ( even you ) let's just drop this one because bottom line, these guys really don't deserve a ban.
